data.name: LearnAbout
data.value: Learn about building multilingual web apps with ASP.NET Core.

data.name: ApplicationDescription
data.value: This web application demonstrates the implementation of a multilingual interface with support for localization and globalization for different languages and regional settings. The application is built on the ASP.NET Core platform and is designed for users who work in different languages (English, Russian and Spanish), with the ability to switch interface languages and adapt the displayed data to the cultural specificities of the selected region.

data.name: LocalizationFeature
data.value: Localized user interface with support for English, Russian, and Spanish

data.name: GlobalizationFeature
data.value: Automatic formatting of dates, times, numbers, and currency based on the selected culture

data.name: TimeZoneFeature
data.value: Localized time zone display for user convenience

data.name: ASPNetDescription
data.value: Used for creating multilingual web pages with localization and globalization support

data.name: JavaScriptDescription
data.value: Used to dynamically update local time

data.name: ResxDescription
data.value: Used to manage multi-language interface texts

data.name: CultureInfoDescription
data.value: Used for handling cultural formats including date, time, number formatting, and currency

data.name: PracticalImportance
data.value: This application is a tutorial example illustrating the process of adding localization and globalization to ASP.NET web applications. Such functionality is in demand in real-world applications where users may be from different countries, with different languages and cultural backgrounds, which requires flexibility of the interface and adaptation of the displayed data.
